== basic ==
⌃       控制代码
⌥       Option 键
open unkown app: control+right click, then choose 'open'
open ~ # open finder
/usr/libexec/locate.updatedb # equal to updatedb, see also `man locate`

== Tips ==
to use locate, first type:
sudo launchctl load -w /System/Library/LaunchDaemons/com.apple.locate.plist
open -a Google\ Chrome index.html
port select --set ipython ipython27

== 打开root用户 ==
open -a "Directory Utility"
打开目录使用工具，点锁，点编辑，开启root用户
